mapper.select: SELECT A.*,C.BMNAME,C.TITLE BMTITLE FROM SA_GROUP A LEFT JOIN SA_BUSINESSMODEL C ON A.BMGUID = C.GUID
SELECT A.*,C.BMNAME,C.TITLE BMTITLE FROM SA_GROUP A LEFT JOIN SA_BUSINESSMODEL C ON A.BMGUID = C.GUID WHERE A.GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into sa_group ( guid, parentgroupguid, groupid, groupname, bmguid,
isadmin, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid,
isvalid, description, storageid,
siteid, libraryguid, calendarguid ) VALUES( #GUID#, #PARENTGROUPGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #GROUPID#, #GROUPNAME#, #BMGUID#,
#ISADMIN#,
'N',
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#ISVALID#,
'Y',
#DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STORAGEID:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#SITEID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LIBRARYGUID#, #CALENDARGUID# )
mapper.update:
update sa_group
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# parentgroupguid = #PARENTGROUPGUID#, groupid = #GROUPID#, groupname = #GROUPNAME#,
isadmin = #ISADMIN#, isadmin = 'N',
isvalid = #ISVALID#, isvalid = 'Y',
description = #DESCRIPTION#, BMGUID = #BMGUID#, storageguid = #STORAGEGUID#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, storageid = #STORAGEID#, siteid = #SITEID#, libraryguid = #LIBRARYGUID#, calendarguid = #CALENDARGUID#,
where guid = #GUID#
